webauthn-module-label: Description for the 'security key' (WebAuthn) type of two-factor authentication method on Special:AccountSecurity
webauthn-javascript-required: Warning message shown in various forms when JavaScript is not enabled.
webauthn-ui-login-prompt: Message explaining user-required actions on login
webauthn-ui-add-key: Button label for adding new WebAuthn keys
webauthn-error-browser-unsupported: Error message when WebAuthn API is not supported by the browser
webauthn-error-browser-unsupported-conso: Error shown to users in the console if their device is unsupported
webauthn-error-auth-generic: Generic error message for authentication process failing
webauthn-error-reg-generic: Generic error message for registration process failing
oathauth-webauthn-registered-keys-sectio: Label for the section for registered keys
webuathn-ui-remove-key: Button label to remove a single WebAuthn key
webauthn-error-module-not-enabled:
Error message when authentication/registration is attempted with module not enabled for the user. 
$1 - module name
$2 - user
webauthn-error-verification-failed: Error message when verification of the WebAuthn key was not successful
webauthn-error-credentials-missing: Error message when the WebAuthn key was not sent by the user
webauthn-error-cannot-register:
Error message when user cannot register new key.
$1 - username
webauthn-error-invalid-new-key: Error message when created instance of WebAuthn is not of appropriate type
webauthn-error-registration-failed: Error message when registering a new key failed, for reasons other than verification failed
webauthn-ui-key-register-help: Help message for UI field for the nickname of a key
webauthn-error-cannot-remove-key: Error message for error occurring during key removal process
webauthn-error-get-authinfo-fail: Error message when authentication info failed to be retrieved
oathauth-webauthn-add-key-section-name: Section header for section that allows registering new WebAuthn keys
webauthn-error-get-reginfo-fail: Error message when registration info failed to be retrieved
webauthn-error-max-keys-reached:
Error message when user cannot register more keys, due to the limit being reached.
$1 - maximum number of keys
webauthn-module-description: Description of WebAuthn module used on Special:OATHManage
webauthn-ui-reload-page-label: Button label for generic page reload action
webauthn-credential-help: Help message for WebAuthn user credential
webauthn-add-security-key: Button label for adding a new WebAuthn key
webauthn-auth-switch-module-label: Label for the 2FA method switcher button on login
